snippet: The drama “After” centers on a secret that could greatly affect an upstate New York family.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews film After, directed by Pieter Gaspersz.
lead_paragraph: The drama “After” centers on a secret that could greatly affect an upstate New York family.

headline.print_headline: A Family With Problems, Not All of Them Obvious
headline.seo: ‘After,’ a Drama With Something to Hide
headline.main: A Family With Problems, Not All of Them Obvious
